    • addCinema

      public static void addCinema(int cineplexId, String cinemaCode, String name, CinemaClass cinemaClass, char[][] cinemaLayout) throws InvalidIdException
      Creates a cinema object and adds it to cineplex repository
      Parameters:
      cineplexId - Id of cineplex
      cinemaCode - Code of cinema
      name - Name of cinema
      cinemaClass - Class of cinema
      cinemaLayout - Layout of cinema
      Throws:
      InvalidIdException - If an id input exception occurs

    • editCinema
